00008 #ifndef TIMER_H_

00011 #include <iostream>
00012 #include <unistd.h>
00013 #include <sys/time.h>
00014 
00015 using namespace std;
00016 
00017 class Timer {
00018 
00019         struct timeval begin;
00020         struct timeval end;
00021 
00022 
00023 public:
00024         static const long MILISECONDS_IN_A_SECOND = 1000;
00025         static const long USECONDS_IN_A_MILISECOND = 1000;
00026 
00027 
00028 
00032         void start() {
00033                 gettimeofday(&begin, NULL);
00034         }
00035 
00039         long seeTime() {
00040                 struct timeval _end;
00041                 gettimeofday(&_end, NULL);
00042 
00043                 long seconds = _end.tv_sec - begin.tv_sec;
00044                 long useconds = _end.tv_usec - begin.tv_usec;
00045                 long mtime = (seconds*MILISECONDS_IN_A_SECOND + useconds / USECONDS_IN_A_MILISECOND);
00046 
00047                 return (double) mtime;
00048         }
00049 
00053         long stop() {
00054                 gettimeofday(&end, NULL);
00055 
00056                 long seconds = end.tv_sec - begin.tv_sec;
00057                 long useconds = end.tv_usec - begin.tv_usec;
00058                 long mtime = (seconds*MILISECONDS_IN_A_SECOND + useconds / USECONDS_IN_A_MILISECOND);
00059 
00060                 return (double) mtime;
00061         }
00062 };
00063 
00064 #endif /* TIMER_H_ */
